DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effect of maternal supplementation with 400,000 IU of oral retinol palmitate in the post-partum, the nutritional situation of the binomial mother-child, on growth and morbidity of children in breastfeeding in the first six months of life.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Maternal Supplementation With Dual Megadose of Vitamin A
DOC.detailed_description: The effect will be assessed by the milk and blood.
DOC.criteria: Pregnant lowrisk obstetric Premature birth Newborn babies with birth defects and / or other serious diseases
